Token.Abstract: The TTTAttributedLabelDelegate protocol defines the messages sent to an attributed label delegate when links are tapped. All of the methods of this protocol are optional.
Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a URL.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Abstract: The label whose link was selected.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The URL for the selected link.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to an address.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Abstract: The label whose link was selected.

Parameter.Name: addressComponents
Parameter.Abstract: The components of the address for the selected link.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a phone number.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Abstract: The label whose link was selected.

Parameter.Name: phoneNumber
Parameter.Abstract: The phone number for the selected link.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a date.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Abstract: The label whose link was selected.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: The date for the selected link.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a date with a time zone and duration.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Abstract: The label whose link was selected.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: The date for the selected link.

Parameter.Name: timeZone
Parameter.Abstract: The time zone of the date for the selected link.

Parameter.Name: duration
Parameter.Abstract: The duration, in seconds from the date for the selected link.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user did select a link to a text checking result.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Abstract: The label whose link was selected.
